description: Describes V8 JS Engine Runtime related attributes.

v8js.heap.space.name.description: The name of the space type of heap memory.
v8js.heap.space.name.note: Value can be retrieved from value `space_name` of [`v8.getHeapSpaceStatistics()`](https://nodejs.org/api/v8.html#v8getheapspacestatistics)
